short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate web browser through connecting nodes, no coding required.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free
Embtion is a Free web browser automation tool.

Easy to use Without code
Use Embtion to automate websites by link nodes, no coding required.

Browser Extension
Support Edge and Chrome. Install the extension in the browser's store.

Automate Any Websites
Automation actions like clicking and typing in any websites.

Various Nodes
Embtion has many nodes to do website automation actions.

Automation without APIs
Work with any websites, no APIs required.

For Data
For data scraping and data entry.

Advance Javascript Mode
Support custom Javascript code runs on the web pages.
